long_description: For daily runs, gym sessions and yoga workouts, you'll love the stretch and comfort of the women's Isis Corsa Shorts. Nylon/spandex fabric provides a lightweight, non-compression fit for active performance. Stretch waistband is designed for optimum comfort and freedom of movement. Mid-thigh length allows full range of motion. Inseam stretch panel in the Isis Corsa Shorts also frees up motion. Hidden inner pocket offers convenient access to ID, a key or lip balm. Closeout.
short_description: For daily runs, gym sessions and yoga workouts, you'll love the stretch and comfort of the women's Isis Corsa Shorts.
